website_summaries.verdict: Featuring tufts of cool blue fur, the reserved Snowball can't help but warm your heart.
pros: Expresses up to 50 reactions and games, including freeze dance mode, when you press nose or pet to activate
Attach to arm, purse, or backpack using twist-lock tail
Light up eyes change color with Snowball's mood
cons: The toy does shed fur sometimes, so be gentle when you brush it

customer_reviews.title: This toy is adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the other reviews. This is a $15 toy, not a new IPhone. Lol The fur isn't as soft as it looks like it should be from the pictures but it is adorable. This toy talks, giggles, purrs and vibrates while purring, shakes and sneezes. The eyes change color and it emotes differently for each press on different places on its head and it is just cute. It is a bit top heavy to wear on a wrist or something but I am sure I can figure out how to attach it to my bag.
customer_reviews.author: AmazinMom4

customer_reviews.title: Fun and interactive
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and even more fun if you have more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamere124

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my granddaughters for the older one's 5th birthday (decided to give one to the 2 1/2 year old to avoid drama) and they loved them. They enjoyed twining them around their arms and wearing them, shaking them to make the music go faster, and loved brushing their fur. I'm not sure about the longevity of their attention but they did bring them over the next time they came to spend the day and seemed to still have a lot of fun listening to the different noises and seeing the eyes change colors.
customer_reviews.author: shellfish

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Eyes are very bright as see in picture...doesnt do much to keep my 9 yr olds attention but I could see a younger child loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this for Christmas present with a "From Santa" label. My daughter was so excited but immediately noticed some dirt around the eyes. I could tell the off-coloring on the fur around the eyes as well. Not sure if it was glue or what. The item came in a sealed plastic bag. How embarrassing. I just told her, "the elves must be getting sloppy. She let it go and loves it. Phew! Hoping she continues to not mind. Great value because I paid $9.99 + tax and free shipping! It was $15 at the arts and craft store. I give it a 3 star because it's neither here, nor there. Great price and convenience but imperfections almost ruined it. Almost.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Product idea is great. Unfortunately an occasional one will be defective. Getting stuck on a weird loop. Like a record with a scratch or a tape or scratched CD I know because I bought several. Wish I'd had an extra for the unfortunate kid that got the defective one. Resulted in a dramatic cry fest
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy! I bought for my niece for Christmas. Since it's only October I don't have any opinion on the durability of the toy but it's adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Mcvey

customer_reviews.title: We shall see what it does..
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I'm not sure what it does yet since I bought it as a Christmas gift for my niece but Amazon assures me it's going to be a top toy this year....
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kay

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my girls for Christmas. Although I have not opened them yet, the box came in perfect condition and the product looks like it is in perfect condition as well. My girls are going to love opening these on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: K.J

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but difficult to wrap around arm or Bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Pomsies for Christmas. The girls love them. The singing, and noises the toy make is cute however, my girls can go overboard with noisy toys. The downside of this is the fur seems to come off and get all over the kids clothing, and when the pet is wrapped around their wrists, arms or bags it doesn't remain in place. So, wearing them is out of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Philip

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy... 3 out if 3 pomsies didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This toy was really cute on Christmas morning and my daughters loved playing with it. However, after 2 or 3 days, it stopped working and made a repetitive skipping sound. I got another one from a different store and the same thing happened. We've tried 3 different lomsies and all of them have been a huge disappointment. I would not recommend this item for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, it’s a Christmas present for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute, it’s a Christmas present for my daughter and I can’t wait to see her face on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Rines

customer_reviews.title: So darn cute!
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was cute, but OMG! This thing purrs and meows. Give this to people to take care of before they have a live animal, you have to take care of these too and they react just the same. These would also be great for people in nursing homes who had to give up their pets. They're really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter will love receiving this Pomsie for her birthday. She asked me to get her one. The color I chose is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very lovable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the great price Amazon was offering that day and thought I'd figure out later which grandchild to give it to. Turns out some of them found it before I had wrapped it, and they all wanted it! Haha, I should have bought several, but I wasn't sure, at the time, just what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is so interesting and cute. My 5 year old just loves with it and plays with it a lot. We kept the paper of directions so we will remember what the different color for the eyes mean. Each color it changes tells you what it wants you to do or what is wrong or if it is happy.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHouseWife

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy actually gets played with
customer_reviews.text: My girl hates all those interactive toys like fingerlings and so forth. She just has no interest. This was her favorite gift this year for Christmas and actually gets played with! And the price was great as well! She's a big cat lover, and this is a nice soft one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Nieces Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were just kittens that purred, but they do so much more. There are a bunch of different settings, dance mode, etc and their eyes change colors based on the different modes and how you are taking care of them. They were an instant hit for a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cute tactile toy
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter asked for this for Christmas. I thought it was going to be another stuffed animal she would play with for 5 minutes and forget about. Not the case with this cutie. She loves it. I am pleased, it's not annoying as some have stated.
customer_reviews.author: joyfulones

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable & has I not looked at the instructions which I don’t normally do I would’ve missed out on secret cute little things this does. It’s my 13mo old daughters and she likes it but I know as she gets older she will like it more
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't given it to my grandson yet but I love playing with
customer_reviews.text: I haven't given it to my grandson yet but I love playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Tonya P.

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t work with the try me.
customer_reviews.text: My little kitty came but when pushed nose nothing happened, pet her nothing happened. Anyway I thought the battery came with her but maybe the battery is dead or she needs an on off switch. It’s a gift so do not want to open.
customer_reviews.author: marticlv

customer_reviews.title: Snowball stopped working after one day of use
customer_reviews.text: Snowball stopped working after one day of use. When you turn snowball on by pressing her nose she is stuck in a loop after one day of use. :/
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved these but they quit working in a day. They still play with them but they are a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mauka

customer_reviews.title: Lights up and makes noise.
customer_reviews.text: At first it didn't light up or make sound but we tore it apart and took the batteries out and when we put them back it worked fine. Daughter loves it, she has it on her computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sesha Steele

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter asked for this for Christmas. She only played with it for 2 days and it broke. It just started making this loud screeching sound. We had to turn it off to get it to stop. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this toy online because it was less expensive than in Walmart and I have no complaints. I pulled the tab out so I could test it and everything works great. The eyes light up and it makes noise. I think my daughter will LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my lil niece could not help myself... opened it and it is the cutest thing pet it and makes sounds. You can put it around pony tails and it is durable. Fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marf

customer_reviews.title: Value and Durability
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered didn't work but they refunded my money and sent me another one yay!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda JoAnn Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Well Received
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my granddaughters ages 8 and 10. They love them because they are interactive and can be wrapped around the wrist for portability.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Going to give as a gift, granddaughter has been wanting these for some time so I know she’ll be happy. Was delivered fast.

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: While this looked cute, it really wasn't that special. It did change colors and go from purring to a dance mode, but my granddaughter lost interest in it quickly.

customer_reviews.title: adorable

product_meta.title: Pomsies 1880 Snowball Plush Interactive Toys, One Size, White
product_meta.description: Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more! Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more!
feature_bullets: Pomsies will tell you when they feel tired, cold or Hungry with adorable light up eyes, purring and cute sounds…only you can give them what they need!
Take it to a new level with a special freeze dance mode you can Play with you and your friends!
Reacts to touch! Light up eyes communicate how they feel!
Touch sensors – pet them, hug them, love them. Over 50 cute sounds!
Twist and lock tail - a great accessory for your backpack, wrist, hair and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars509 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
